      • build

        public static Classifier build(java.lang.String id)
        Builds the classifier with the specified experiment id.
        Parameters:
        id - Experiment id
        Returns:
        Classifier, or null if experiments was not found

      • readDataset

        public static Dataset readDataset(java.lang.String dataset_name,
                                  DataSource reader)
        Reads the training dataset from file. The dataset must be of CSV type and be located in the data folder. The application exits if the dataset cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        dataset_name - Name of the training dataset
        reader - Data reader instance
        Returns:
        The dataset

      • findAvailableExperiments

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> findAvailableExperiments()
        Returns a list of all experiment IDs in the experiments.xml file.
        Returns:
        List of experiment IDs
